name: Tombstone Motel, Lodge & Backpackers
description:
Tombstone Motel Lodge & Backpackers Picton offer a unique experience for everyone of all ages. Our fully insulated, warm and modern accommodation provides guests with a variety of rooms from private to shared facilities. Apartment, Motel rooms, Queen en-suites, Queen and twin rooms with shared bathrooms and Dorms. This affordable/budget accommodation makes it ideal for families, couples, or the solo traveler. Group bookings are welcome. 

We can also book your wine tour or trip in the Queen Charlotte Sounds.

In the lodge a separate communal area, you can enjoy a game of table tennis, game of pool, work out in our gym or just simply chat while taking in the harbour/mountain views from our balcony. We provide the following free... breakfast... toast and fresh hot cheese scones with hot drinks available throughout your stay. Also free is the spa, bike usage,and unlimited wifi. We are the closest accommodation provider for all users of the Bluebridge ferry. Tombstone is also a 10 minute walk to the town centre. 

Resident pets include birds, cats, dog and a goat.

groupInformation.cancellationTerms: Group bookings are required to give 7 days notice of cancellation to avoid penalty charges and a non-refundable deposit of 25% of the booking value is required when the booking is made. Group bookings are defined by 10 or more people.Reducing the number of nights of a booking while checking in may result in penalty charges.
groupInformation.additionalTerms:
Validation
Credit card details entered when making a booking will be validated – if the details provided are incorrect the booking may be removed from our system. 
Check-in/out time
Check-in time is between 1pm – 10pm. If you anticipate an arrival later than 10pm please contact us and we will provide you with late arrival instructions that enable you  to self check-in at any hour.
Check-out of your room by 10am please but you are welcome to stay on the premises until your onward transport departs. 
Key returns
No key deposit is taken but management reserve the right to charge $15 for failure to return your room key.
Storage
No responsibility is taken for guests personal property left on the premises, secure storage is available upon request.
Discipline
Management reserve the right to take action in the event of unruly behavior – property damage, theft, inappropriate behavior may require those concerned to leave the premises.
No smoking inside (outside designated smoking areas only).
Shuttle transport
Pickups are available by advance notice but not later than 9pm. Returns to onward departures are at specific times and must be pre-arranged.

houseRules.notes:
Written cancellation by email is required. Bookings that are canceled more than 48 hours before arrival will incur no charge. For any booking cancelled within 48 hours of arrival the first nights accommodation will be charged to the credit card number provided. The same will be taken for any 'No Show' bookings.
All cards are pre-authorized 3/4 days prior there arrival date. This involves holding the total amount of the room rate until the guest arrives. The guest has the choice to cancel the pre-authorization and pay an alternative way ie. cash, credit card, debit card, or allow us to complete the transaction. If the guest cancels their booking outside the cancellation period, the pre-authorization will be cancelled.

Reception is open from 8am till 7pm. 

Winter reception hours will apply, contact hostel for these times.

Earliest check in 2pm, We cater for late arrivals after 7.00pm when Reception closes. A map and key are left out for the guest in a 'late arrivals box'.

Late check outs can be arranged through prior arrangement and may incur an extra cost.

Please consult us if you are traveling with children, we may be able to make special arrangements.

Any free nights booked online, is non-refundable.

No responsibility is taken for guests personal property left on the premises.

No smoking inside (outside designated smoking areas only).

It is managements right to take action to unruly behavior, damage, theft, smoking inside, or inappropriate behavior from which may require those concerned to leave the premises.

Guests are required to provide a New Zealand or Australian telephone number, email address and approximate time of arrival
